subject: Football
Television
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The former Indianapolis Colts’ coach, Tony Dungy, and Rodney Harrison, the former New England Patriots’ safety, will join NBC’s revamped studio show, “Football Night in America.”
snippet: The former Indianapolis Colts’ coach, Tony Dungy, and Rodney Harrison, the former New England Patriots’ safety, will join NBC’s revamped studio show, “Football Night in America.”
